message: Hello, what can you do

I'm here to help you with dining options at New York University Abu Dhabi! You can find our menus, check item availability, or place an order through me. Let's get startedâ€”what would you like to know or order today?
Can I order 4 pepperoni pizzas and a chicken alfredo

Great! I found 4x Pepperoni (AED 43.0 each = AED 172.0) and Chicken Alfredo (AED 35.0) on our menu. The total for your order would be AED 207.00. Would you like to place an order for these items? Please respond with 'yes' to confirm or 'no' to cancel.

[ORDER CONTEXT] User wants to order: 4x Pepperoni (AED 172.0), Chicken Alfredo (AED 35.0)

Total: AED 207.00

Still needed:
- NYU ID (8 digits)
- Valid building number (options: A1A, A1B, A1C, A2A, A2B, A2C, A3, A4, A5A, A5B, A5C, A6A, A6B, A6C)
- Phone number
yes

Great! To confirm your order, I'll need a few more details from you. Please provide your 8-digit NYU ID, valid building number (options: A1A, A1B, A1C, A2A, A2B, A2C, A3, A4, A5A, A5B, A5C, A6A, A6B, A6C), and your phone number. Once I have these details, I'll finalize your order for pickup.
Hey, yeah can I also add some chicken nuggets to my order

Of course! I found Chicken Nuggets (AED 19.0) on our menu. The total for your updated order would be AED 226.00 (4x Pepperoni, Chicken Alfredo, and Chicken Nuggets). Would you like to place an order for these items? Please respond with 'yes' to confirm or 'no' to cancel.

Total: AED 226.00

- Phone number
yes

Great! To confirm your updated order, I'll need a few more details from you. Please provide your 8-digit NYU ID, valid building number (options: A1A, A1B, A1C, A2A, A2B, A2C, A3, A4, A5A, A5B, A5C, A6A, A6B, A6C), and your phone number. Once I have these details, I'll finalize your order for pickup.

[ORDER CONTEXT] User wants to order: 4x Pepperoni (AED 172.0), Chicken Alfredo (AED 35.0), Chicken Nuggets (AED 19.0)

- Phone number
Ok, here's my NYU ID: 12345678

Great! For the building number, please select one of the following options: A1A, A1B, A1C, A2A, A2B, A2C, A3, A4, A5A, A5B, A5C, A6A, A6B, A6C. Once I have your building number and phone number, I'll finalize your order for pickup.
Yes, can you deliver to F1

I'm sorry for the confusion, but it seems there was an error in my response. Delivery is currently not available at NYU Abu Dhabi dining halls. You can only place orders for pick-up. If you would like to continue placing your order for pick-up, please provide me with your phone number after selecting a valid building number from the options I provided earlier.

Yes, ok I want to deliver to A1A

I'm sorry for the confusion earlier. Delivery is currently not available at NYU Abu Dhabi dining halls. You can only place orders for pick-up. If you would still like to place your order for pick-up, please provide me with your phone number after selecting a valid building number (A1A) from the options I provided earlier.

Great! To finalize your order for pick-up, please provide me with your phone number. Once I have these details, I'll process your order and prepare it for pick-up at the A1A dining hall.

Great! I found 4x Pepperoni (AED 172.0), Chicken Alfredo (AED 35.0), and Chicken Nuggets (AED 19.0) on our menu. The total for your order would be AED 226.00. Your order has been placed successfully for pick-up at the A1A dining hall. We will contact you via phone number 1234567891012021012 once it's ready for collection. Thank you for ordering with us! Enjoy your meal!
